channel.title: Windows Vista
channel.description:
Well I'm on homebasic.
Can anyone tell me some cool tricks?
Oh and how can you like change the taskbar color to blue?

item.title: Windows Vista
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Cheese_Police, post:51, topic:182344”][quote author=dragonfire455 link=topic=244002.msg2074635#msg2074635 date=1203918074]
i love how people rag on a OS, come on guys, its just a system that has a lil more features then XP
[/quote]

A “lil more”?

You have no fucking idea what you are talking about.
I for one am using a syntax server to write this message.[/quote]
What is a syntax server?
Also, what are its benefits?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

If you torrent Vista from some cheap site, you’ll be caught in a matter of time. Every update or download, Windows scans for genuine Window’s version. If you don’t got, you’re fucked.

item.title: Windows Vista
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

From what people told me about Vista before I had it, I didn’t like it very much. After buying my new laptop, I realized that everybody here heard from one guy that it was bad. The OP is quite a marvel to have, and I’m glad I have it. I’d take it over XP any day.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows Vista

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Iamadam:

Well, I’ll admit I hated vista before I even got it - now that I’ve used it, I hate it all the more.

Me too, It came on my new laptop and I used it for a few hours before I installed kubuntu.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows Vista
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

[quote=“CrushMe, post:37, topic:182344”][quote author=Not X A Alex link=topic=244002.msg2063638#msg2063638 date=1203390921]

And since Windows 7 come in 2009 it will have more bugs and error than Vista, and i hope then people and they who make games and programs go over to Linux since Windows don’t work anymore.

I, For one, have tried linux. I don’t think its for me. Its a little more difficult to use.
[/quote]

AS bowserjr2 said use it for maybe an hour or two and youl get the hang of it One thing you must NOT do is presume its going to run like Windows does… it will ask a few questions, but atthe end of the day these quesitons help and improve performence etc…

Also if your running on not so much ram and using vista, turn of that fucking sidebar…[/quote]
I tried it for 2 weeks +
I was not amused.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows Vista
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

And since Windows 7 come in 2009 it will have more bugs and error than Vista, and i hope then people and they who make games and programs go over to Linux since Windows don’t work anymore.
[/quote]
I, For one, have tried linux. I don’t think its for me. Its a little more difficult to use.[/quote]

AS bowserjr2 said use it for maybe an hour or two and youl get the hang of it One thing you must NOT do is presume its going to run like Windows does… it will ask a few questions, but atthe end of the day these quesitons help and improve performence etc…

Also if your running on not so much ram and using vista, turn of that fucking sidebar…

Read full topic

item.title: Windows Vista
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

billygotshot:

I dont get why everyone hates vista so much… all in all its not a bad operating system in my opinion…

Because Linux has better Windows compatibility than Vista?

[quote=“billygotshot, post:20, topic:182344”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=244002.msg2060952#msg2060952 date=1203316776]

I dont get why everyone hates vista so much… all in all its not a bad operating system in my opinion… and from what everyone says it takes up a crap load of ram? well im not sure about that because i can do more with vista then i could with xp -.-

Only thing you can’t do with XP that you can with is use DirectX 10.
Lots of thing does not work so good on Vista that it do on XP.
[/quote]

a little troubleshooting and everything works fine for me -.- in 5 years everyone will probably start switching to vista.[/quote]

Just a shame that windows “7” is expected to be released some time in 2009 to 2011.

Read full topic
